title: Southeast Asia gaming revenue share 2013 - 2017 , by country
summary: The statistic shows the Southeast Asia gaming in the Southeast Asia compared to the Malaysia of the Malaysia and the Philippines Asia gaming from 2013 to 2017 .
As of 2019 , Southeast Asia in the Southeast Asia was 21 % among the local population .
gold: The statistic presents the gaming revenue share in Southeast Asia from 2013 to 2014 , with a forecast until 2017 , broken down by country.
According the calculations , the gaming industry in Southeast Asia will be worth nearly 2.22 billion U.S. dollars in 2017 , with Thailand 's gaming revenue accounting for 22 percent of that sum.
In 2016 , Indonesia was to be the largest mobile gaming market in the region , generating over 330 million U.S. dollars in revenue , while Thailand was said to rank second that year .
